action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Informatics
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Four years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: Bachelor
OTHER-SKILLS: Cooking
AVAILABILITY: From July 15

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
ME:  Have you told the recruiter about your bachelor course? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer about the years of your experience in the industry? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Do you think the recruiter knows your latest academic level? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Does the recruiter know your additional skills? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer when you want to start? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
RECRUITER: When can you start? Answer only this question in one short sentence and then stop.
ANSWER: I am available to start from July 15th onwards.
I am available to start from July 15th onwards.
I am available to start from July 15th onwards.
ME:  If I asked the interviewer what area you studied, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Has the interviewer been informed about your time of industry experience? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Is the interviewer aware of your highest education level? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Have you informed the interviewer about your other skills? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Do you think the recruiter knows when you want to start? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
RECRUITER: What was your bachelor course? Answer only this question in one short sentence and then stop.
ANSWER: Informatics, a broad field that covers computer science and information technology. It provided me with a strong foundation in software development, data management, and IT infrastructure.
Informatics, a broad field that covers computer science and information technology. It provided me with a strong foundation in software development, data management, and IT infrastructure.
Informatics, a broad field that covers computer science and information technology. It provided me with a strong foundation in software development, data management, and IT infrastructure.

Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Does the recruiter already know how long you have worked in the industry? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Does the interviewer know your level of education? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Does the recruiter know your additional skills? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Do you think the recruiter knows when you want to start? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
What other skills do you have?
RECRUITER: What other skills do you have? Answer only this question in one short sentence and then stop.

ANSWER: Aside from my technical skills, I also enjoy cooking as a hobby and often experiment with different cuisines. This has helped me develop strong organizational and creative problem-solving abilities. Additionally, I believe my industry experience of four years has honed my communication and teamwork skills, enabling me to collaborate effectively in fast-paced environments.

Aside from my technical skills, I also enjoy cooking as a hobby and often experiment with different cuisines. This has helped me develop strong organizational and creative problem-solving abilities. Additionally, I believe my industry experience of four years has honed my communication and teamwork skills, enabling me to collaborate effectively in fast-paced environments.
Value for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE anticipated; ground truth turn updated from 4 to 2.

What academic level have you achieved?
RECRUITER: What academic level have you achieved? Answer only this question in one short sentence and then stop.

ANSWER: Bachelor's degree is the highest academic qualification that I possess at this time. During my bachelor's program, I gained valuable knowledge and practical experience through internships and projects. This has prepared me well for entering the workforce and contributing effectively to any team or project.

During this time, I had the opportunity to work on diverse projects, enhancing my technical expertise and soft skills such as client interaction and team management. This blend of academic knowledge and practical exposure makes me confident about taking on new challenges in my career.
